# Data Operators Notes

## JMESPath Reference

Common expressions used in testing:
- `input.field` - Direct field access
- `input.nested.field` - Nested access
- `items[0]` - Array index
- `items[*].name` - Map over array
- `items[?status=='active']` - Filter array
- `sort_by(items, &date)` - Sort array
- `length(items)` - Array length
